scripts.build:js: uglifyjs js/jquery.js js/bootstrap.min.js js/jquery.easing.min.js js/jquery.fittext.js js/wow.min.js js/creative.js js/cbpAnimatedHeader.js js/classie.js -o wwwroot/app.js
scripts.build:css: cat css/bootstrap.min.css css/animate.min.css css/creative.css | cleancss --s0 -o wwwroot/css/style.min.css
scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run build:css && npm run build:html && npm run build:fonts && npm run build:img
scripts.setup: mkdir wwwroot && mkdir wwwroot/css && mkdir wwwroot/img && mkdir wwwroot/img/portfolio && mkdir wwwroot/font-awesome && mkdir wwwroot/font-awesome/css && mkdir wwwroot/font-awesome/fonts
scripts.rebuild: npm run clean && npm run setup && npm run build
